tool_description: API for fetching YouTube subtitles, allowing users to download subtitles in various formats and languages.

api_list.name: Download mp3
api_list.description: Download mp3 audio from a YouTube video.

required_parameters.name: videoId
required_parameters.description: YouTube Video ID to identify the video.

api_list.name: List all available subtitles
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all available subtitles for a specified YouTube video.

required_parameters.name: videoId
required_parameters.description: YouTube video ID to fetch subtitles for.

api_list.name: List languages
api_list.description: Get a list of all supported languages for subtitles.

api_list.name: Get Subtitle in JSON format
api_list.description: Fetch the subtitle for a YouTube video in JSON format.

required_parameters.name: videoId
required_parameters.description: YouTube video ID to retrieve the subtitle.

optional_parameters.name: translated
optional_parameters.description: Auto-translate subtitle to the requested language if not present.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Specify the language for the subtitle.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to use human-generated or auto-generated subtitles.

api_list.name: Get subtitle in SRT format
api_list.description: Retrieve the subtitle for a YouTube video in SRT format.

required_parameters.name: videoId
required_parameters.description: YouTube video ID to fetch the SRT subtitle.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to use human-generated or auto-generated subtitles.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Specify the language for the SRT subtitle.

optional_parameters.name: translated
optional_parameters.description: Auto-translate subtitle to the requested language if not present.
